name: gitreplicate
friendlyName: Replicates one Git repo to another
description: The task pulls the contents of one repo and commits them to another one.
author: Dan Stocker
helpMarkDown: Pulls the contents of one repo and checks it into master in another

inputs.name: SourceRepo
inputs.label: Source Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full Git URL of the source repo. Include protocol (e.g. https://)

inputs.name: SourceRepoUser
inputs.label: Source Repo Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name of the source repository. Leave blank for personal access token.

inputs.name: SourceRepoPass
inputs.label: Source Repo Password or PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password or personal access token for the source repository.

inputs.name: Branch
inputs.label: Source Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the branch to replicate. The destination branch will be master.

inputs.name: DestinationRepo
inputs.label: Destination Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full Git URL of the destination repo. Include protocol (e.g. https://)

inputs.name: DestinationRepoUser
inputs.label: Destination Repo Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name of the source repository. Leave blank for personal access token.

inputs.name: DestinationRepoPass
inputs.label: Destination Repo Password or PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password or personal access token for the source repository.

inputs.name: CommitMessage
inputs.label: Commit Message
inputs.defaultValue: Automatic commit initiated by the vNext agent
